message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you. Our initial offer for the product is $15000. We're confident in its worth and hope you'll see its value as well.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I can only afford $10000. Is this a price you'd be willing to accept?
